characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through an urban area. A cyclist on the right side of the road suddenly collides with a white sedan parked ahead. The cyclist falls to the ground, causing a potential hazard for the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is approaching a white sedan parked ahead. The vehicles speed is steady, but it needs to decelerate due to the sudden collision of the cyclist with the parked sedan. The vehicle maintains a safe distance from the incident.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, collides with a parked white sedan, causing a potential hazard. 2) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, parked and involved in the collision.
